bioconda.name: bioconductor-mergeomics
bioconda.summary: Integrative network analysis of omics data

biotools.summary: Multidimensional Data Integration. This web aplication serves as a flexible framework for integrating multidimensional omics-disease associations, functional genomics, canonical pathways and gene-gene interaction networks to generate mechanistic hypotheses. It includes two main parts: a Marker Set Enrichment Analysis (MSEA) and a weighted Key Driver Analysis (wKDA).

bioschemas.summary: Multidimensional Data Integration.
